page.title: 08RELIGION IN BREICH VALLEY
page.content: The area,like most of Scotland is chiefly served by the Church of Scotland and the Roman Catholic Church.Both Addiewell and Stoneyburn have a Presbyterian and Roman Catholic church.Stoneyburn also has an Evangelical church.Breich has one church,used by The Church of Scotland, in the village. Both Roman Catholic churches were built in the early part of the Twentieth Century while the Presbyterian churches were established in the area a little earlier.In fact Addiewell Parish Church celebrated its centenary in 1985.
